Package classes

Class Upgrade

java.lang.Object
classes.Upgrade
public class Upgrade extends Object
Upgrade is the class that handles the methods and construction of Upgrade Objects. These methods involves buying and the taking effect of upgrades.

    • random

      public Random random

  • Constructor Details

    • Upgrade

      public Upgrade(String name, Double playEffect, Double crocEffect, Double courEffect, int costYC, int timesBuyable, String description, boolean moreCroch, boolean moreCour, String imgFileName)
      Creates a new Upgrade object
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Upgrade
      playEffect - Multiplier of the Upgrade to the Player's current yarn over rate
      crocEffect - Multiplier of the Upgrade to all Crocheter's current yarn over rate
      courEffect - Multiplier of the Upgrade to all Courier's speed
      costYC - Cost of an Upgrade in yarn coins
      timesBuyable - Amount of times that an Upgrade can be bought
      description - Description of the upgrade
      moreCroch - Indicates whether the upgrade adds a random Crocheter to playerCrocheters
      moreCour - Indicates whether the upgrade adds a random Courier to playerCrocheters
      imgFileName - Image file name of the Upgrade

  • Method Details

    • getUpgradeList

      public static ArrayList<Upgrade> getUpgradeList()
      Retrieves the list of all available upgrades.
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of Upgrade objects representing all available upgrades.

    • getUpgrade

      public static Upgrade getUpgrade(int index)
      Retrieves a specific upgrade from the upgrade list based on the index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the upgrade in the upgrade list.
      Returns:
      The Upgrade object at the specified index.

    • getPlayerEffect

      public double getPlayerEffect()
      Retrieves the effect of the upgrade on the player.
      Returns:
      The effect of the upgrade on the player as a double value.

    • getCrocheterEffect

      public double getCrocheterEffect()
      Retrieves the effect of the upgrade on the crocheter.
      Returns:
      The effect of the upgrade on the crocheter as a double value.

    • getCourierEffect

      public double getCourierEffect()
      Retrieves the effect of the upgrade on the courier.
      Returns:
      The effect of the upgrade on the courier as a double value.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the upgrade.
      Returns:
      The name of the upgrade as a String.

      Retrieves the description of the upgrade.

      The description of the upgrade as a String.

      public int getCost()
      Retrieves the cost of the upgrade in yarn coins.
      Returns:
      The cost of the upgrade as an integer.

    • getImageFileName

      public String getImageFileName()
      Retrieves the filename of the image associated with the upgrade.
      Returns:
      The filename of the image associated with the upgrade as a String.

    • isBuyable

      public boolean isBuyable()
      Returns a Boolean indicating whether an Upgrade can be bought based on the Player's current yarn coins and the Upgrade's cost
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating whether an Upgrade can be bought

    • isMaxed

      public boolean isMaxed()
      Returns a Boolean whether an Upgrade is already maxed
      Returns:
      Boolean whether an Upgrade is already maxed

    • upgradeBought

      public void upgradeBought() throws UpgradeAlreadyMaxedException, NotEnoughMoneyException
      Runs the effectUpgrade method. If the increaseCrocheter is true, it will add a random Crocheter to playerCrocheters, likewise with Couriers. It also doubles the price of the Upgrade and deducts 1 from the the Upgrade's timesBuyable variable
      Throws:
      UpgradeAlreadyMaxedException - If the Upgrade is already maxed
      NotEnoughMoneyException - If the Player does not have enough money to buy the Upgrade

    • effectUpgrade

      public void effectUpgrade()
      Multiplies the Player's and all of Player's Crocheter's current yarn over rate by the Upgrade's playerEffect and crocheterEffect respectively. This also multiplies the speed of all of Player's couriers by the courierEffect.
